issue.title: Gazebo can't playback large log files

content.raw:
It loads with the gui_log_playback branch, but it has a lot of problems while trying to play back and skipping in time barely works (it worked well for the first 10th of the log or so but then either stopped working or just takes forever to skip to a timestamp). It also seems to be extremely slow at playing back the logs despite accumulating huge amounts of memory (~10gb for a 4.2gb log).

edit: loading an entire 2gb log (i.e. playing back the entire log) seems to consume 13gb memory.
content.html:
It loads with the gui_log_playback branch, but it has a lot of problems while trying to play back and skipping in time barely works (it worked well for the first 10th of the log or so but then either stopped working or just takes forever to skip to a timestamp). It also seems to be extremely slow at playing back the logs despite accumulating huge amounts of memory (~10gb for a 4.2gb log).

edit: loading an entire 2gb log (i.e. playing back the entire log) seems to consume 13gb memory.
